entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 31 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
